forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Light Rain then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 11am, then a slight chance of rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 68. South wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 45. West northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. North northwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 35. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before midnight, then freezing rain and rain showers between midnight and 3am, then snow showers and sleet and freezing rain. Cloudy. Low around 25, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers before 8am, then a chance of snow between 8am and 11am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 29. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 12. North wind 0 to 15 mph.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 39. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 1am, then freezing rain and rain showers between 1am and 4am, then freezing rain and a slight chance of sleet between 4am and 5am, then snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. Northeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers before 8am, then a chance of snow between 8am and 11am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 29. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 12. Northwest wind 0 to 15 mph.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails closed for the day. We will clean up the trails following this weather event.
nubsNob.comments:
Nub's Nob is Closed today due to a widespread power outage. Following the storm we will have some major tree debris to clean-up. 

Please check back to our website in the morning for an update on when we will be able to open.

The last scheduled day of the season is April 6.
